alert.note: Alert for Knox; Sullivan (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 03 at 11:57AM EST until March 07 at 9:24PM EST by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Indiana...Illinois... White River at Hazleton and at Petersburg. Wabash River at Montezuma...and at Terre Haute down to Mount Carmel. ...The Flood Warning is cancelled for the following rivers in Indiana... East Fork White River near Bedford and near Rivervale..Multiple rounds of recent precipitation, preceded by snow melt, continue to keep minor flooding ongoing on the White River at Petersburg and Hazleton, and most of the Wabash River from Montezuma downstream. Moderate flooding on the Wabash at Mount Carmel is forecast to drop to minor flooding later today. Both rivers have crested and are receding. Flooding on the lower portions of the Wabash river is expected to last as long as about March 8. The White river flooding is expected to last until March 7. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL MONDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Wabash River at Riverton. * WHEN...Until Monday evening. * IMPACTS...At 20.0 feet, Extensive flooding is in progress. Higher rural roads begin to flood. High water isolates many river cabins. Seep water becomes a problem. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 AM CST Thursday /11:00 AM EST Thursday/ the stage was 19.9 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 10:00 AM CST Thursday /11:00 AM EST Thursday/ was 20.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage Monday morning and continue falling to 9.7 feet Sunday, March 13. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. The next statement should be issued this evening.
